# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is not just any product; it's a game-changer in its field, offering unparalleled performance and value. We believe its worth far exceeds $8000, but considering its unique features and the benefits it could bring to you, we're willing to offer it at this exceptional price. We understand that value is subjective and varies from person to person, so if you're interested in exploring how this product could transform your needs or business, let's discuss further. Don't hesitate to ask any questions or share your thoughts on how this product could fit into your life or work. We're confident it has the potential to exceed your expectations. Here's to unlocking new possibilities together! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
